# Cardano´s block saturation analysis

![](https://ucarecdn.com/b2d8ccbe-5460-4c02-bb23-7a2425b9affb/)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%271043%27%20height=%27438%27/%3e)
![Cardano´s block saturation analysis](/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fucarecdn.com%2F6de30b6e-be45-45df-afe4-b13ce5eb5e21%2F&w=3840&q=75)

Despite market conditions, Cardano usage is growing.

Please note the increased efficiency of transactions - i.e. transactions for one purpose are now smaller than they had to be before. Even so, block saturation is not decreasing, indicating activity on the network.

**Monthly block saturation average is 40.88%. This means that almost half of the blocks cap is used.**

Live data: <https://cexplorer.io/usage>![](https://ucarecdn.com/ac0cb721-c606-4f29-9e8c-ae7654313a3a/-/preview/-/format/auto/-/quality/smart/)

![](https://ucarecdn.com/ac0cb721-c606-4f29-9e8c-ae7654313a3a/-/preview/-/format/auto/-/quality/smart/)
